item.title: Fiber Optic Wavelength Services for San Francisco and Silicon Valley
item.description: AboveNet is expanding its high-capacity fiber optic network services by offering new low-latency wavelength services. These services will be available in the San Francisco Bay Area and Silicon Valley, including key locations like Santa Clara and San Jose, California. AboveNet’s Core Wave solutions utilize ROADM (Reconfigurable Optical Add/Drop Multiplexer) technology, enabling dynamic wavelength add/drops for various protocols such as Ethernet, TDM, storage, and video transport. This results in flexible service options, scalability, and fast provisioning.
